attributes.action: Stop tax evaders appearing on BBC especially asking us to donate to charity.
attributes.additional_details: Make it a law that anyone who is guilty of tax avoidance will not appear on the BBC.
attributes.background: We see so many celebrities and sportsmen on the BBC asking us to donate to charity, but so many of the self-promoting personalities have used schemes to "avoid" tax. Anyone who is found guilty of "avoiding" tax should be banned from the BBC.

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for determining who appears on BBC programming. This is a matter for the BBC and production companies engaged to produce content for the BBC.
